Package uo.ri.cws.application.service.training

Interface CertificateService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CertificateServiceImpl
public interface CertificateService
This service is intended to be used by the Manager It follows the ISP principle (@see SOLID principles from RC Martin)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int generateCertificates()
    Generates certificates according to the rules: - Each vehicle type specifies the number of attended-and-passed training hours needed to get the certificate for that vehicle type - The mechanic has to accumulate at least that number of hours in one or several courses - A course specifies the % of training hours devoted to some vehicle types

  • Method Details

    • generateCertificates

      int generateCertificates() throws BusinessException
      Generates certificates according to the rules: - Each vehicle type specifies the number of attended-and-passed training hours needed to get the certificate for that vehicle type - The mechanic has to accumulate at least that number of hours in one or several courses - A course specifies the % of training hours devoted to some vehicle types
      Returns:
      the number of new certificates generated DOES NOT @throws BusinessException
      Throws:
      BusinessException
